description: Dorodoron is the 3rd of the Dark Fall to attack Earth after Moerumba fails. He`s an arachnic-like creature that travels underground instead of through the air. Dorodoron transforms earth-objects like rocks and cobblestones into Uzainaa monsters. He also takes some commands from 2 suspicious girls (Kiryuu Kaoru and Kiryuu Michiru) that are in the same class as Mai and Saki. His name comes from the word "doro" which means "mud" in Japanese.
name: Dorodoron
